entry.title: Voting by locking coins
entry.summary: On August 8, 2015, Hector Chu asked if there had ever been a discussion about locking coins until a certain date for casting votes on an issue. John Dillon proposed a blocksize vote scheme in response to this question. The proposal was posted on the bitcoin development mailing list and is archived at https://www.mail-archive.com/bitcoin-development@lists.sourceforge.net/msg02323.html. The proposal suggests locking coins until a certain date for casting votes on an issue.
